rules_text: Each player chooses a party from among creatures they control, then returns each creature not chosen this way to their owner's hands. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]Unchosen paths, broken past, forespoken wrath
The pain won't cease, no sweet release[/i]
